snippet: The businessman convicted in an embezzlement and vote-buying scheme tied Brazil’s former president, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, received a 40-year sentence in October.
abstract: Roberto Gurgel, Brazi's prosecutor general, says that he will analyze testimony in which Marcos Valerio de Souza, businessman convicted in embezzlement and vote-buying scheme, tied former Pres Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva to scandal.
lead_paragraph: The businessman convicted in an embezzlement and vote-buying scheme tied Brazil’s former president, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, received a 40-year sentence in October.

headline.main: Brazil: Prosecutor to Analyze Testimony by Suspect About Former President
headline.print_headline: Brazil: Prosecutor to Analyze Testimony By Suspect About Former President
